amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for the Electricity Delivery and Energy Reliability Office by $20 million and reduce funding for Departmental Administration by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy by $20 million and reduce funding for Departmental Administration by the same amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McNerney amendment (A025) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the McNerney amendment (A025) Failed by voice vote.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A025) offered by Mr. McNerney.
